author: morciuch
msg: Improvements to jsp support (see Bugzilla issue# 11864):
2. Ability to use PortletConfigState and PortletSessionState with non-Velocity portlets.
3. Attribute "js_peid" is now available within underlying template for JspPortlet

author: morciuch
msg: Added prefix option to prevent clashing of check box names with other parameters with the same name

author: taylor
msg: Added interface for DB PSML Manager. This is necessary for a delegating PSML that I wrote, which stores some of its PSML resources in the webapp, and others in the database.

author: taylor
msg: WML was broken since the default controller was changed in the configuration. It was column.vm, now it is flow.vm
In trying to fix it last week, I accidently changed XML instead, breaking it.
Hopefully Ive got it right this time...

author: ggolden
msg: cleaned up the init code, which had some bad formatting, and a misleading
exception if any parameters had trouble...
also changed the parameter reading to use strings and convert them to type
here, so we can have multiple settings of these values in our resources.properties
